import React from "react"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; export default function AboutUs() { return (
About Us | NMAI

About Us

NMAI (National & Major Affairs India) is a platform dedicated to providing high-quality current affairs, MCQs, and daily quizzes for students and competitive exam aspirants.

Our mission is to simplify current affairs preparation through structured content, category-wise articles, and practice tools.

NMAI is built with a focus on accuracy, clarity, and exam relevance.

); }
